amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities Of The Second Class And Villages
amendatorysection.catchline: Appointed officers and employees; compensation; fixed by ordinance.
amendatorysection.para: The appointive officials and other employees of the village shall receive such compensation as the chairperson and village board of trustees shall designate by ordinance; and the annual salary of the chairperson and other members of the village board of trustees shall be fixed by ordinance.
